SGA pregnancies are at risk of term (rarely preterm) intra -uterine fetal demise (IUFD), fetal distress in 
labour and pre-eclampsia 
These risks are not contra- indications to vaginal delivery, but requires continuous CTG monitoring 
throughout labour
